I.3. Recruitment and selection process
involves the Dean, concerned Chair,
faculty representative/s, and other
administrators concerned.

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
OFFICE MEMORANDUM No. ____ s. 2021
To: ALL CONCERNED
From: GIL D. RAMOS Campus Administrator
Subject: Composition of Screening Committee
Date: 28 June 2021
In line with the opening of classes for the First Semester, AY 2021-2022, the following are
designated members of the screening committee of faculty applicants at CvSU-Tanza Campus.
Chair: Prof. Gil D. Ramos Members: Local HRDO Coordinator Ms. Debbie Rose T. Banag
Department Chairs: Arts and Sciences Mr. Mark Joel C. Sibulo
Information Technology Ms. Joyce Erika S. Senaris Management Mr. Ritch M. Banate Teacher Education Prof. Mildred A. Sebastian
Please be guided accordingly.
